articles.title: Delhi records 2nd hottest April in 72 years
articles.description: The national capital experienced three prolonged heatwaves this month in the absence of periodic light rainfall and thundershowers which typify this time of the year due to the lack of active western disturbances.

articles.title: Musk sells Tesla shares worth $8.5 billion, says no more sales planned
